Class ProfileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group17.game.core.ProfileManager

  • public class ProfileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to manage profiles. Serialise profiles to save and load them.

    1.0
    Author:
    Laurence Rawlings
